NeuPhysics Packages
==================================



:Last Updated: |today|

This is the documentation for my python and Mathematica packages. It is far from complete.


NeuOsc is a python package for neutrino oscillations.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   neuosc/index.rst


I also wrote several Mathematica packages for neutrino physics.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   mathematica/index.rst
